message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) because it deals with text recognition, which is a natural language processing task. It could also belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) because text recognition is often a part of image processing tasks. The paper also discusses the use of a piece-wise function to reinterpret the CTC loss, which is a machine learning technique, so it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper's focus on sequence learning and the use of a novel re-weighting method could also make it relevant to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
